g.you_need_private_password_or_key_not_a_p: You need a private password or key (not a public key)

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had perviously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Please login with %(provider)s to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun:
Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using %(APP_NAME)s's blockchain-based multi factor authentication.

We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails.

Please be prepared to verify your identity.

Regards,

Ned Scott

CEO Steemit
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.

The reputation score is based on the history of votes received by the account, and is used to hide low quality content.

user_profile_permissions.APP_NAME_is_a_social_media_platform_wher: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content

%(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.

tips_js.liquid_token:
Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_token: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.estimated_value: The estimated value is based on an average value of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s in US dollars.
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.VESTING_TOKEN_is_non_transferable_and_re: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferrable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of your STEEM POWER is currently delegated to you. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.
